title: Medical device certifications (FDA, CE marking, ISO 13485)
dataVerified: Manufacturer name, facility location, certification body, certificate number, expiration date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Recalled date (if recalled). Link to FDA press release (if recalled, public). Link to audit system (FDA inspectors and notified bodies only, requires login)
rationale: Prevents MedPro-style fraud. Domain binding verifies legitimate certification body. High-stakes regulatory compliance. Medical device manufacturers don't need to carry physical certificates to customer sites while maintaining instant verifiability.
